This update fixed the save issues, and works fine for me.  Includes all DLC [installs with the installer - just be sure it's enabled in the game settings] and new exe's. Be sure to use the DirectX runtime updater included in the installer, as the game uses Dx9.

This makes loading problems even worse.  Every other game load results in a freeze.  Need task manager to kill process and restart game.  Before game issues were tolerable.  At least on my computer this update was definitely a mistake.  Great game though, a lot of gory fun.  I think I'll reinstall first version.

Seems that the launcher is broken in this update. Vertical sync mode checkbox does nothing and after you update it using this it is forced ON.

To fix this, you need to have "iPresentInterval=0" in the "Fallout_default.ini" file (in installation root).
Thanks AiTB.

i managed to fix the 5:0000065434 problem by right clicking the dvd icon and opening with winrar,then just dragged the two files in SKIDROW to my desc top then drag them to the bethesda file in program files.u might have dll file probs just take not of the code and download them for free.just type them into a seach engine and should come up with loads of sites u can download them from.hope this helps as im a bit of a noob.steep learning curve! :-)

I downloaded this fix and it pretty fixes **Thx /b/ros.** everything and includes all DLC specials

And I also apply my own personal fix to make the game compatible to my system

Credits goes from: http://geekmontage.com/texts/fallout-new-vegas-game-fixes-crashes-audio-issues-lag-saving/

"Game Lagging / Stuttering From Direct-X?"
This is the same fix as the above DLL crash fix method. Some of you may not be crashing from not having this DLL, but instead may be suffering lag and game stuttering.

1. Download the dx9d9.dll: http://www.newvegasnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=34778 (Nexus)
2. Put the file in your game folder

Ive done that dx9d9 thing. it tricks the game into thinking you have a older graphics card and so the graphics and look of the game are not that good. im happy to have lag and good looking graphics and patience waiting till they get around to making all gpu's work with the game.
